DOC.brief_title: Health Faith ( Salud Fe ) : Community-Based Diabetes Pilot Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes prevalent morbid condition affect Latinos , especially Mexican-Americans United States . South Lawndale , predominately-Mexican neighborhood Chicago , disproportionately high diabetes relate mortality rate comparison rest Chicago U.S . Many church-based intervention show promise improve health outcome among minority population ; data church-based intervention Latino population scarce . Mobilizing community resource develop church-based , diabetes self-management intervention may lead sustainable , culturally tailored intervention , improve outcome Latinos diabetes . Considering growth Hispanic population disproportionate burden chronic disease , develop program aim decrease health disparity population crucial . Our study propose fill gap .
